text: The 1997 FIBA Under-19 World Championship for Women took place in Brazil from 5 to 13 July 1997. It was co-organised by the International Basketball Federation (FIBA) and Brazilian Basketball Confederation. Twelve national teams competed for the championship. United States came away with the Gold medal by defeating Australia 78-74 in the final.FIBA Archive. 1997 World Championship for Junior Women. Event Standings.
